channel.title: Items not showing up in shops
channel.description: Ok i have a pretty good idea on how to make shops but for some reason i cant get it working. i have the guy there and i can trade him but when the shop window pops up its blank any ideas i suppose is has something to do with this code in the shop.cfg so here it is [code]shop = 2 Wood_Cuttin_Supply 2 2 1000 1000 06739 1000 6739 1000 [/code]

item.title: Items not showing up in shops
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

ok coco i figured out what u meant there is a second click section and i am guessing i delete the code in the first click and add it to the second??? i guess i will try![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2008, 10:17:14 am[/size][hr]OMFG it works thank You all!!!

item.title: Items not showing up in shops
item.dc:creator: @izzygoo izzygoo
item.description:
@izzygoo wrote:

Search for your second click npc packet… it’s the same thing as the first click that you added under it but when you click trade… which is the second option when you right click on the shop keeper. Thats why they call it second click.

Read full topic

item.title: Items not showing up in shops
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

find the NPCId, delete the first NPC option one. (the correct one you added) Find the NPCId again and replace the code in there with the code you had for first NPC option.

item.title: Items not showing up in shops
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I am pretty sure it is opening it
Look heres my code in Client.java } else if (NPCID == 520) { // WC Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2;
Here is my code in Shops.cfg

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 66 Brett's_Relleka_Shop 2 2 391 1000000 4151 1000 14511 shop = 67 Mod_&_Admin_Shop 2 2 15183 100 15181 100 14819 shop = 2 Wood_Cuttin_Supply 2 2 6739 1000 06739 1000

---------------Update---------------
for some strange reason if i press talk it bring up the right shop but if i click trade it bring up a blank shop how do i fix this it makes no sense

Read full topic
